definition: Verwüstung refers to the act or result of causing extensive damage, destruction, or devastation to a place or area. It is commonly used to describe the aftermath of natural disasters, such as storms, floods, or earthquakes, as well as the consequences of war or violent conflicts.

examples.german: Die Verwüstung nach dem Sturm war enorm.
examples.english: The devastation after the storm was enormous.

examples.german: Die Verwüstung der Stadt durch den Krieg war erschütternd.
examples.english: The devastation of the city by the war was shocking.

examples.german: Die Verwüstung der Natur durch den Menschen ist bedenklich.
examples.english: The devastation of nature by humans is concerning.

examples.german: Die Verwüstung des Hauses durch den Brand war verheerend.
examples.english: The devastation of the house by the fire was devastating.

examples.german: Die Verwüstung der Ernte durch die Schädlinge war katastrophal.
examples.english: The devastation of the harvest by pests was catastrophic.
